name: The Last Spirit
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR MINI GAME JAM 25: SPIRITS

Hi! I'm Exxcluded and you're playing the last Spirit! I'm surprised I managed to complete this project in 1 day! Non-stop!

The last Spirit is a game about a spirit that refuses to go to the afterlife because it still needs to do something on earth, that has been destroyed by the gods. But as a result of this a god comes to collect him and he refuses. I will not reveal any more of the story.
